page_header: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
we_have_not_been_able_to_save: We have not been able to save the information you submitted on the previous screen. This may be because the page was inactive for too long, or because of a technical issue.
use_the_back_link: use the back link to return to the previous screen and resubmit the information
sign_out_of_the_service: sign out of the service, and then sign back in
